children.text: Alright, I need to translate this Python code into C. Let's look at what the Python code is doing step by step.
children.label: code_analysis

children.text: First, the Python code reads an integer n from input. Then it reads a string s. Then it checks if n is odd. If it is, it prints 'No'. If n is even, it checks if the first half of the string is equal to the second half. If they are equal, it prints 'Yes', else 'No'.
